title: Sans serif font with elonged leg on the R
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020213102im_/http:/typophile.com/files/tigerlily_5085.png)

A friend of mine had a logo designed with this font and now the designer can't tell her what font it is (and has lost the original files apparently). Any help identifying it would be great! I went through all the automated font ID sites already and could not find a match..
author: jackfiasco
